goals: Standardize 75% of medical inventory in 12 months

why_it_matters.summary: Orbits unifies inventory operations across departments, improves material availability, and supports regulatory readiness through traceability.

details.strategic_alignment: Orbits supports system-wide visibility and governance of supply chain functions, aligning with enterprise asset strategies.
details.staff_experience: Simplifies restocking and eliminates duplicate inventory tracking workflows, reducing manual logging effort.
details.patient_impact: Ensures reliable stock of critical supplies, preventing procedural delays or safety issues from missing materials.
details.operational_efficiency: Allows for inter-facility transfers, vendor returns, and usage tracking in one system, improving response time and budget accuracy.
details.regulatory_readiness: Links inventory use to specific rooms or devices, ensuring audit trail compliance for Joint Commission and CLIA.
